means: 周中（指一周中间的日子）

sentence.Network_en: By midweek officials were speaking hopefully of a "compromise".
sentence.Network_cn: 一周过半时，官员们谈论到“折中方案”都满怀希望。

sentence.Network_en: They'll be able to go up to London midweek.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们可以在一周的中间去伦敦。

sentence.Network_en: The package includes midweek flights from Gatwick.
sentence.Network_cn: 套餐里包括在一周中间从盖特威克机场出发的航班机票。

...照，这些照片将会刊登在檀香山发行量最大的免费刊物《周间报》（Midweek）上。
golf有哪些专业术语？ [高尔夫]_爱问知识人 ... Member 会员 Midweek 平日（周一至周五） Neck 杆颈.

list.abs: After the midweek draw with Manchester United , Wenger Sol Campbell may take a breather ., 在周中踢平曼联后 , 温格说坎贝尔将会得到休息的机会.
If you travel midweek , the fare is higher than if a saturday night is include ., 如果周中去旅游 , 包括周六晚上在内的话 , 车票价格就会高一些.

entry.def: Midweek describes something that happens in the middle of the week.

example.ex: The package includes midweek flights from Gatwick.
example.tran: 套餐里包括在一周中间从盖特威克机场出发的航班机票。

means.word_mean: 1. occurring during the middle of the week;
1. in the middle of the week

auth_sentence.content: This lovely midweek supper treat adapts easily for vegetarians.
